document.heading: Organ and Bone Marrow Donor Leave Amendment Act of 2002

history.narrative: Law 14-148, the “Organ and Bone Marrow Donor Leave Amendment Act of 2002”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 14-135, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 5, 2002, and April 9, 2002, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 26, 2002, it was assigned Act No. 14-326 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 14-148 became effective on June 25, 2002.
